text:
I’ve looked into this before, but not really got anywhere it just get’s the workflow ID but i don’t think you can do anything with that other than add it to the form tag {% form form_follow_ups_workflow_id=“{{*workflow ID*}}” %}

I’ve tried to bypass the form tag before for on the fly forms using the js hbspt.forms.create({}) but there’s no option to add a workflow id in there
I would love for the “Back to….repeater” to be at the bottom of the module rather than on top.
should be in both spots. Sometimes you got really long module options, sometimes you dont eitherway, both places should have it IMO

Or the "Save and go to module list" should actually just take you back to the repeater area if it's a module that has repeating fields?? I can't tell you how many times I've clicked that and then had to click all the way back into my module. Started to try and get in the habit of clicking Apply and then scrolling back up to click Back instead.
If I clone a field inside a repeater, then drag it out of the repeater, it is just broken. I can't copy the snippet/value
It is non existent really, even though it shows up -- it's just broke
